mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE flag = 'N'
SELECT boardNo, writer, title, views, origin, parent, depth, createdAt FROM board WHERE flag = 'N' ORDER BY origin desc, boardNo desc LIMIT #{param1}, #{param2}
SELECT boardNo, writer, title, content, views, origin, parent, depth, createdAt FROM board WHERE flag = 'N' AND boardNo = #{param1} ORDER BY origin desc, boardNo desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (writer, title, content, origin, parent, depth, createdAt) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{origin}, #{parent}, #{depth}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
